description: This table stores the indications of use selected for a medication record.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line count of associated changes in Indication(s) of Use for the order record.

columns.name: INDICATIONS_ID
columns.description: The indications of use selected for a medication order.

columns.name: INDICATIONS_ID_MEDICAL_COND_NAME
columns.description: This contains the name of the medical condition.
